sections.title: Oracle (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Oracle class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Oracle)
sections.description: Oracles are proficient with all simple weapons, light armor, medium armor, and shields (except tower shields), with some oracle revelations granting additional proficiencies.

sections.title: Spellcasting (Oracle)
sections.description: Oracles cast divine spells from the cleric spell list using Charisma as their spellcasting ability, learning a limited number of known spells but casting spontaneously without preparation.

sections.title: Mystery (Oracle)
sections.description: Each oracle chooses a divine mystery at 1st level that determines their spell list, class skills, and special abilities, gaining additional mystery spells every two levels.

sections.title: Oracle’s Curse (Ex) (Oracle)
sections.description: Every oracle has a permanent curse chosen at 1st level that provides both benefits and hindrances, with effects scaling based on oracle level.

sections.title: Orisons (Oracle)
sections.description: Oracles learn 0-level spells called orisons that can be cast repeatedly without consuming spell slots.

sections.title: Revelation (Oracle)
sections.description: Oracles gain revelations at 1st, 3rd, 7th, 11th, 15th, and 19th levels that grant special powers and abilities related to their mystery, usually activated as standard actions.

sections.title: Final Revelation (Oracle)
sections.description: At 20th level, oracles learn their mystery's ultimate revelation, granting powerful capstone abilities specific to their chosen mystery.

sections.title: Diverse Mysteries (Su) (Oracle)
sections.description: At 20th level, oracles can select two revelations from a different mystery, expanding their abilities beyond their original mystery choice.
